name: Dermi #2
description:
“Dermi” 
10 NFT series
3277 x 4096px
 
NFT collectors that procure a trippy "Dermi" NFT will gain the ability to solve difficult mysteries such as “who took the cookie from the cookie jar”.
 
"Dermi" also increases the owner's understanding of existence. Test subjects became one with the universe and started levitating. 2 out of 10 subjects hit their head on a ceiling fan.
 
Test subjects reported a  minor side effect to “Dermi”. Involuntary break dancing at inappropriate times such as while in a crowded elevator.
 
 
Secondary market sales come with a custom twitter banner NFT. 
 
If you own or previously owned an image NFT from 3 different series of mine, you will "UNLOCK" an opportunity to buy an ANIMATION NFT
 
Please direct message me on Twitter @Microgemanisms after purchase
